name: Hidden Mars
description:
Hidden Mars is a game to search for the famous cat of space.


It's a fun quest for Felicat among rockets and space race Mars rovers. It's a game with black and white drawings and illustrations.

Find the cat Felicat.
You can find more than 100 hidden Felicats


Feature Zoom In and Zom Out for more details


Important information

• Press “M” for mode Mars
• Press Del and Esc to reset game.

Be patient!
Hold the anxiety!
Relax and travel through the space to find the astronaut felicat.
